entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
